title: DISTANCE UNKNOWN
synopsis: 50 years after the Vietnam War, two students from Hanoi travel to Orange County, California, where many Vietnamese war refugees settled in the 1970s. There, they asked three generations of Vietnamese American men, unknown to one another, to reflect on their national heritage.
availability: The film is currently in post-production and is scheduled to release in mid-2026. See Press Gallery for open positions and contact information.
